members.name: Permissions.query()
members.description: Returns the user permission status for a given API.

parameters.name: PermissionDescriptor
parameters.description: An object that sets options for the query operation consisting of a comma-separated list of name-value pairs. The available options are: name: The name of the API whose permissions you want to query. Valid values are 'geolocation', 'midi', 'notifications', 'push', and 'persistent-storage'. userVisibleOnly: (Push only, not supported in Firefox — see the Browser Support section below) Indicates whether you want to show a notification for every message or be able to send silent push notifications. The default is false. sysex: (Midi only) Indicates whether you need and/or receive system exclusive messages. The default is false.

members.name: Permissions.request()
members.description: Requests permission to use a given API. This is not currently supported in any browser.

members.name: Permissions.revoke()
members.description: Revokes the permission currently set on a given API.

parameters.name: descriptor
parameters.description: An object based on the PermissionDescriptor dictionary that sets options for the operation consisting of a comma-separated list of name-value pairs. The available options are: name: The name of the API whose permissions you want to query. Valid values are 'geolocation', 'midi', 'notifications', and 'push'. userVisibleOnly: (Push only, not supported in Firefox — see the Browser compatibility section below) Indicates whether you want to show a notification for every message or be able to send silent push notifications. The default is false. sysex: (MIDI only) Indicates whether you need and/or receive system exclusive messages. The default is false.

parameters.name: TypeError
parameters.description: Retrieving the PermissionDescriptor information failed in some way, or the permission doesn't exist or is currently unsupported (e.g. midi, or push with userVisibleOnly).
